Question: Mercedes-Benz USA CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Mercedes-Benz at CES 2024

Product Highlight

-MBUX Virtual Assistant with advanced AI and 3D graphics for a hyper-personalized and intuitive customer experience

-Concept CLA Class, based on Mercedes Modular Architecture (MMA) and MB.OS, offering close-to-production insight into the future family of four vehicles, with an electric G-Class prototype

-MBUX SOUND DRIVE, an innovative in-car music feature developed in collaboration with will.i.am

-A partnership with Audible and Amazon Music for immersive audio experiences

-Integration of cloud gaming with Antstream Arcade

-Introduction of DRIVE PILOT for SAE Level 3 conditionally automated driving in the U.S., initially available in California and Nevada

-Global high-power Mercedes-Benz-branded charging network rollout, starting in North America and extending to Europe, China, and other main markets
Summary_cn:
奔驰在2024年的CES展会上

产品亮点

-搭载先进人工智能和三维图形的MBUX虚拟助手，实现超个性化和直观的客户体验

-基于奔驰模块化架构（MMA）和MB.OS的CLA级概念车，展示未来四款车型家族的近乎生产级别的设计，其中包括一款电动G级原型车

-与will.i.am合作开发的创新车载音乐功能MBUX SOUND DRIVE

-与Audible和Amazon Music合作，提供沉浸式音频体验

-与Antstream Arcade合作，将云游戏整合到车内娱乐系统中

-首次在美国推出DRIVE PILOT，实现SAE 3级有条件自动驾驶，最初在加利福尼亚州和内华达州提供

-在北美首先推出全球高功率奔驰品牌充电网络，随后扩展至欧洲、中国和其他主要市场
